original_text: At that time, Solomon and the big crowd of Israelites who were with him had a festival for seven days. They gave honour to the Lord our God. There were people from everywhere in Israel, from Hamath in the north to the Stream of Egypt in the south.
korean_text: 그 때에 솔로몬이 칠 일과 칠 일 도합 십사 일간을 우리 하나님 여호와 앞에서 절기로 지켰는데 하맛 어귀에서부터 애굽 강까지의 온 이스라엘의 큰 회중이 모여 그와 함께 하였더니

sentences.original_text: At that time, Solomon and the big crowd of Israelites
who were with him had a festival for seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있는 자들이 이레 동안 절기를 지켰고

sentences.original_text: They gave honour to the Lord our God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리 하나님 여호와께 경배를 드렸다

sentences.original_text: There were people from everywhere in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 온 땅에서 온 백성들이 있었으니

sentences.original_text: to the Stream of Egypt in the south
